plot: When the Checks Stop Coming In is a candid investigation into the lives of black celebrities who go from fame and fortune to downright broke. We look behind the curtain and into their lives to find out how they got into financial trouble.
title: When the Checks Stop Coming In
plot_es: When the Checks Stop Coming In is a candid investigation into the lives of black celebrities who go from fame and fortune to downright broke. We look behind the curtain and into their lives to find out how they got into financial trouble.
original_name: When the Checks Stop Coming In
plot_en: When the Checks Stop Coming In is a candid investigation into the lives of black celebrities who go from fame and fortune to downright broke. We look behind the curtain and into their lives to find out how they got into financial trouble.
